banks.bankDescription: State Bank of Mauritius (SBM) (Estb. 1973, headquartered in Port Louis, Mauritius with 43 branches) The second-largest bank in Mauritius with a market share of 25% of domestic bank assets acquired a majority stake in Fidelity Commercial Bank Ltd. (Kenya) in 2016. With the philosophy of putting their customers first in everything they do and a total asset valuation of approximately US$3.34 billion (2011), the SBM group consists of its subsidiary businesses in Kenya, Mauritius, Madagascar and India.
